generated_body: The article titled "Is retirement dying? The old work model is disappearing for Boomers, Gen Xers" is likely to explore the evolving nature of retirement and work trends among older generations. Readers may expect an analysis of how traditional retirement models are changing due to economic factors, societal shifts, and the rise of gig work. The piece could provide insights into the implications of these changes for individuals nearing retirement age and may include statistics or expert opinions on workforce participation among Boomers and Gen Xers.
